name: Orbs Match HD
description:
Orbs Match HD is a fun and very addictive game for match-3 lovers!, playing it is very easy: just move the orbs to make matches of 3 or more before the orbs overflow or time runs out.

Features:
- Addictive gameplay
- Colorful HD graphics
- Great Music and SFX
- 50 challenging levels and more
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Close the game any time and resume later
- Play your iPhone music

More info and video at www.boviosoft.com
